Articles.Content:
Single Stage To Suborbital Glide Path

I am starting a project for a transport/commercial plane. It will accelerate to a suborbital trajectory lined up with the destination with a  

rocket engine. Then it will glide to the destination, and land with little or no power. Pics in follow-up post.

4 minutes ago, QvestionAnswerNeeded said:

Single Stage To Suborbital Glide Path

I am starting a project for a transport/commercial plane. It will accelerate to a suborbital trajectory lined up with the destination with a  

rocket engine. Then it will glide to the destination, and land with little or no power. Pics in follow-up post.

We will watch your craft design with great interest!
Thx for support... Although my laptop just went into a coma - 9 year old Mac - so no telling when I can actually do this project.
My computer finally woke up again, so I can start the project! I already have all the plans laid out, and just need a bit of tweaking and placement of a makeshift airport across the sea to the east.
